articles.author: Mogomotsi Magome, Michelle Gumede
articles.title: US signs new health deals with 9 African countries that mirror Trump’s priorities - AP News
articles.description: The U.S. government has signed health deals with at least nine African countries. These new deals reflect the Trump administration's priorities and its focus on mutual benefits. Kenya, Nigeria and Rwanda are among the countries that have signed these agreemen…
articles.content: JOHANNESBURG (AP) The U.S. government has signed health deals with at least nine African countries, part of its new approach to global health funding, with agreements that reflect the Trump administr… [+6016 chars]
